document.bingtitle: If you had to eat fast food for the rest of you life and could ...
document.webtitle: If you had to eat fast food for the rest of you life and could only choose one restaurant, which would you choose? Why?
document.description: ... have to get the food and drink from only one fast-food restaurant. ... I do reserve the right to change my vote if a better ... but Chick-Fil-A actually has a "breakfast" menu.
